definition: satellite TV (abbr. for 衛星電視|卫星电视[wei4 xing1 dian4 shi4])
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.english: The beautiful MC is from Phoenix TV.
sentences.chinese: 主持是凤凰卫视的美女杨舒。

sentences.english: November 2009, Hubei TV challenge joke king won the first prize.
sentences.chinese: 2009年11月，湖北卫视挑战笑话王获一等奖。

sentences.english: Phoenix TV reporter Luqiu is famous for her bravery.
sentences.chinese: 凤凰卫视记者闾丘以她的勇敢著称。

sentences.english: Another complained that Hong Kong-based Phoenix television cut away from live transmission of the speech as the fracas began.
sentences.chinese: 还有人抱怨香港的凤凰卫视在事件发生时将画面切走。

sentences.english: The theme song of Xiamen TV , 2008. It's very magnificent and heart-stirring .
sentences.chinese: 2008年厦门卫视主题曲，大气磅礴，励志动听。

sentences.english: Improving Everyday, a talk show from Hunan Satellite TV, is changing its orientation towards an education show.
sentences.chinese: 如湖南卫视的《天天向上》就被包装成教育节目。

sentences.english: But it was no long time that HuNan satellite TV fell into a serious loss.
sentences.chinese: 但是时隔不久，湖南卫视便陷入了严重亏损之中。

sentences.english: Interviews regarding Chen Lin broadcast by Fenghuang Satellite Television are not permitted.
sentences.chinese: 不准凤凰卫视播出对陈林的采访。

sentences.english: Many satellite TV stations will ban the costume drama at prime time. What is your opinion?
sentences.chinese: 各大卫视黄金档禁播古装剧，你又怎么看这件事情呢？

sentences.english: Ambassador Liu was also interviewed by the journalists from the Phoenix Satellite Television.
sentences.chinese: 刘大使还现场接受了凤凰卫视的采访。

definition: to broadcast over a network/(radio or TV) hookup/simulcast
iQiyi, online video platform based in Beijing, launched in 2010
to broadcast/to air (a TV program etc)
China Central Television (CCTV), abbr. for 中國中央電視台|中国中央电视台[Zhong1 guo2 Zhong1 yang1 Dian4 shi4 tai2]
online variety show (contracted form of 網絡綜藝節目|网络综艺节目)
abbr. for 春節聯歡晚會|春节联欢晚会[Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4]
